mapper.select: select q.quizId, q.userId, q.quizTitle, q.quizContent, q.releaseTime, q.praiseCount, u.userId, u.userNickName from quiz q join user u on q.userId=u.userId order by q.releaseTime desc limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

select q.quizId, q.userId, q.quizTitle, q.quizContent, q.releaseTime, q.praiseCount, u.userId, u.userNickName from quiz q join user u on q.userId=u.userId order by q.praiseCount desc limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
select u.* from quiz q join user u on q.userId=u.userId where q.quizId=#{quizId}
select t.tagName from tag t join quiz_tag qt on t.tagId=qt.tagId where qt.quizId=#{quizId}
